promotion.mainText: NFTs for Fanatics, Filmaholics, Foodies & more. Find Your Fandom.

sports.title: Real fans never leave early
sports.description: Collectibles for the tailgaters, face painters, court stormers, and jersey burners. For the fanatics that live for The Hail Marys, buzzer beaters, walk-offs and winning shots.

creatures.description1: Playbooks brings to life the most memorable plays from the college and professional careers of football legends. Each NFT focuses on a defining gridiron moment, chosen by the player, and highlighted with artistry, animation and recorded commentary from the athletes themselves.
creatures.description2: The custom, limited edition Playbooks NFTs - Phenom, Star, Icon and Legend - have unlockable rewards for those who collect all four of the same player, including virtual events with the players and rare signed memorabilia.
creatures.stepsDesc: What you can do to prepare:
creatures.steps1: Sign up now and get notified when they arrive
creatures.sign_up: Sign up now, if you dare →
creatures.title: Exiled Aliens

buyCreatures.fundWallet: You don't have enough money for buying a Creature. You can fund your wallet here

whitelist.walletInvalid: Your wallet address is not approved for minting at this time. Please check the Discord for when you are eligible.

playbooks.title: Playbooks
playbooks.primaryText: Playbooks brings to life the most memorable plays from the college and professional careers of football legends. Each NFT focuses on a defining gridiron moment, chosen by the player, and highlighted with artistry, animation and recorded commentary from the athletes themselves.
playbooks.secondaryText: The custom, limited edition Playbooks NFTs - Phenom, Star, Icon and Legend - have unlockable rewards for those who collect all four of the same player, including virtual events with the players and rare signed memorabilia.

fantasyLeague.title: Hall of Fantasy League
fantasyLeague.primaryText: The Hall Of Fantasy League (“HOFL”) is the first National Fantasy League that allows its participants to experience a fantasy team with a community of shared Stakeholders. The HOFL is backed by The Hall of Fame Resort & Entertainment Company (NASDAQ: HOFV, HOFVW), the only resort,
fantasyLeague.secondaryText: entertainment and media company centered around the power of professional football. 2021 marks the HOFL’s inaugural season and the 10 league teams are celebrated through the first, exclusive HOFL NFT drop.

heroletes.title: Heroletes
heroletes.teaser: Digital collectibles that bring together the worlds of comic books and groundbreaking athletes. From the imagination of former Marvel designer Anthony Francisco, your favorite athletes from a range of sports are reimagined as their very own superhero character. Collect your favorites and build your SuperTeam.
heroletes.secondTeaser: Enter the Heroletes Sweepstakes for a chance to win new rare digital items and real-life experiences that you can’t find anywhere else. Grand prize IRLs may include lessons from the world’s top athletes, hand-picked professional sports gear signed by the pros themselves, and much more. NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. See
heroletes.thirdTeaser: for full details and how to mail-in free entry. Ends 03/20/22. Scroll for prize details.

firstItem.title: Start Your Collection
firstItem.description: Heroletes are sold in packs of three or more NFTs that vary in design and rarity.

secondItem.title: Build Your SuperTeam
secondItem.description: There are 32 different design combinations for each athlete, designed by award-winning artist Anthony Francisco.

thirdItem.title: Enter the Sweepstakes
thirdItem.description: Enter the Heroletes Sweepstakes and you could win real life experiences or digital designs that you can’t find anywhere else.

carousel.link: Check out all NFTs included in this collection
carousel.firstArticle: NO PURCHASE NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN. A PURCHASE WILL NOT INCREASE YOUR CHANCES OF WINNING. INTERNET ACCESS AND VALID ACCOUNT IS REQUIRED TO ENTER.  Void where prohibited or restricted by law. Official Rules available at
carousel.secondArticle: Offered in and open only to legal residents of the 50 U.S. who are 18 + (or legal age of majority whichever is older). Begins 2:30 pm ET 2/10/2022 and ends 11:59 pm ET 3/20/2022. See Official Rules How to Enter section for mail-in entry request (“MIR”) instructions to enter without purchase; MIR(s) must be labelled as provided in Rules, postmarked by 3/21/2022 and received by 3/25/2022. Limit (46) eligible entries into First prize drawing and limit up to (10) Qualified entries into Grand prize drawing, regardless of entry method used. Odds depend on number of eligible entries received for each respective drawing. Limit (1) First prize and/or (1) Grand prize per person. See Rules for further limitations restrictions and details. Void where taxed, prohibited or restricted by law. SPONSOR: Dolphin NFT Studios, Inc., Miami, FL.

sweepstakes.title: Heroletes Sweepstakes
sweepstakes.article: Collect & enter for the chance to win a once-in-a-lifetime experience or pro gear from world champions and icons in winter sports.
sweepstakes.description: . Offered in and open only to legal residents of the 50 U.S. who are 18 + (or legal age of majority whichever is older). Begins 2:30 pm ET 2/10/2022 and ends 11:59 pm ET 3/20/2022. See Official Rules How to Enter section for mail-in entry request (“MIR”) instructions to enter without purchase; MIR(s) must be labelled as provided in Rules, postmarked by 3/21/2022 and received by 3/25/2022. Limit (46) eligible entries into First prize drawing and limit up to (10) Qualified entries into Grand prize drawing, regardless of entry method used. Odds depend on number of eligible entries received for each respective drawing. Limit (1) First prize and/or (1) Grand prize per person. See Rules for further limitations, restrictions and details. Void where taxed, prohibited or restricted by law. SPONSOR: Dolphin NFT Studios, Inc., Miami, FL.

item.title: The Details:
item.description: Collect a full Set of 16 collectibles from any one athlete and be entered to win one of the five Grand Prices:

dropdown.title: First Prize (10)
dropdown.description: Purchase a Heroletes Winter Sports Champions pack from DolphinNFTs.com and be entered for a chance to win one of ten First Prizes.
dropdown.secondDescription: A custom piece of digital artwork created by former Marvel designer Anthony Francisco. Because there are only ten prints of this unique piece of art, there can only be ten winners.

sellNft.title: This NFT is yours
sellNft.subtitle: It is in your personal gallery

login.title: Sign in using your FTX.us account

mfa.title: Two-factor authentication required
mfa.subtitle: Please enter the 6-digit verification code that we've just sent to your phone.
mfa.subtitle2: Or, if you are using Time-based One-time Password (TOTP) checkout your app

error.firstNameError: First name must be at least 3 characters long
error.lastNameError: Last name must be at least 3 characters long
error.passwordError: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one symbol and one number

walletSetup.title: Account Set Up
walletSetup.subtitle: You are almost ready!
walletSetup.description: You must activate your wallet before you start collecting. We recommend doing this ahead of time -- don’t worry, you won’t be charged until you decide to purchase.

kyc.title: Set your wallet to continue
kyc.criminalRecord: I certify that I do not have a criminal record
kyc.notExposedPerson: I certify that I am not a politically exposed person or government official

creditCard.title: Add a credit card
creditCard.text: We recommend funding your wallet ahead of purchasing as there may be processing time needed. Using a credit or debit card is the easiest way to get started.
creditCard.text3: from another wallet to get started.

verification.title: We need to verify your card to continue
verification.description: This is just a security step. Please enter the amount we just charged to your credit card.
verification.question: Didn't receive any charges?
verification.loadingMsg: We are processing your data, this might take a few seconds...
verification.successMsg: Great! Your credit card was verified successfully

error.creditCardNumber: Credit Card should be VISA or MASTERCARD
error.expiryMonth: Month should be formatted as M or MM
error.expiryYear: Year should be formatted as YYYY
error.country: Country should be formatted as XXX
error.district: State should be formatted as XX
